content.raw:
Gazebo is crashing whenever I click on `Edit Model`:

~~~
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff6c899bc in __GI___libc_free (mem=0x7fffffffb4a0) at malloc.c:2945
2945	malloc.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff6c899bc in __GI___libc_free (mem=0x7fffffffb4a0)
    at malloc.c:2945
#1  0x00007ffff549560e in boost::detail::sp_counted_base::release (
    this=0x8355060)
    at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/detail/sp_counted_base_gcc_x86.hpp:146
#2  0x00007ffff54cda17 in ~shared_count (this=0x7fffffffb458, 
    __in_chrg=<optimized out>)
    at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/detail/shared_count.hpp:371
#3  ~shared_ptr (this=0x7fffffffb450, __in_chrg=<optimized out>)
    at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:328
#4  gazebo::gui::PartData::Load (this=this@entry=0x82f45c0, _sdf=...)
    at /home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/gazebo/gui/model/ModelData.cc:211
#5  0x00007ffff54bf4d1 in gazebo::gui::ModelCreator::CreatePartFromSDF (
    this=this@entry=0x34f06b0, _linkElem=...)
    at /home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/gazebo/gui/model/ModelCreator.cc:713
#6  0x00007ffff54c1204 in gazebo::gui::ModelCreator::LoadSDF (
    this=this@entry=0x34f06b0, _modelElem=...)
    at /home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/gazebo/gui/model/ModelCreator.cc:307
#7  0x00007ffff54c1ebe in gazebo::gui::ModelCreator::OnEditModel (
    this=0x34f06b0, _modelName=...)
    at /home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/gazebo/gui/model/ModelCreator.cc:250
#8  0x00007ffff77ec9a9 in boost::function1<void, std::string const&>::operator() (this=<optimized out>, a0=...)
~~~
content.html:
Gazebo is crashing whenever I click on Edit Model:

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
